DOC.brief_summary: The principal manifestation of hemorrhoidal disease is bleeding; however the severity evaluation is today based on prolapsus (Goligher classification) and bleeding factor is not included. Even if there was some rare score including bleeding in literature , none of them were validated. The aim of the study is first validation of bleeding score .
DOC.criteria: Age>18 years consulting for hemorroidal bleeding accept to participate paraplegic or hemiplegic patient Misunderstanding of the French language
